All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.awt.image.ImageConsumer
public class MaskFilter
extends java.awt.image.RGBImageFilter

An image filter that will replace one color in an image with another color.

Deprecated. use getInstance instead to reuse the same instance

Constructs a MaskFilter object that filters color of image to another color

Parameters:
oldColor - old color in exist image that needs to be replaced by new color
newColor - new color to replace the old color

Creates an image as negative of an existing one. It will basically replace the black color with white color.
